clinical_study.official_title: Postoperative Recovery and Longterm Outcome After Thoracic Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: A questionaire specifically developed using in depth interviews with patients that has undergone surgery has been developed. This questionaire will be used for longterm follow in patients undergoing thoracic surgery. 200 patients will be asked to fill in this questionaire preoperatively as well as 3 and 12 months after surgery to assess symptomburden after surgery with specific aim to study postoperative pain as well as other physical, mental and cognitive problems that may affect the patient and their daily activities, health, return to work, family life and economy.

detailed_description.textblock:
In Sweden around 400 000 patients under go surgical operations in hospitals. A large proportion, around 20%, develop persistent postoperative pain which affects their quality of life and their recovery towards a normal life.
A questionaire specifically developed using in depth interviews with patients that has undergone surgery has been developed. This questionaire will be used for longterm follow in patients undergoing thoracic surgery. 200 patients will be asked to fill in this questionaire preoperatively as well as 3 and 12 months after surgery to assess symptomburden after surgery with specific aim to study postoperative pain as well as other physical, mental and cognitive problems that may affect the patient and their daily activities, health, return to work, family life and economy.

primary_outcome.measure: Postoperative pain 3 months after surgery as compared to preoperatively assessed with a studyspecific questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pain at 3 months after surgery as compared to preoperatively
primary_outcome.description: Pain at 3 months after surgery as compared to prior to surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Postoperative functional impairment after surgery assessed with a studyspecific questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Status at 3 months after surgery as compared to before the operation
secondary_outcome.description: Physical, mental and cognitive problems were assessed with a studyspecific questionaire 3 months after surgery as compared to preoperatively

secondary_outcome.measure: Postoperative functional impairment 12 months after surgery assessed with a studyspecific questionnaire 12 month after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Status 12 months after surgery compared to before surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Physical, mental and cognitive problems 12 months after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Postoperative pain 12 months after surgery as compared to preoperatively assessed with a studyspecific questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pain at 12 months after surgery as compared to preoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: Pain at 12 months after surgery as compared to prior to surgery
